meanings.definition: Not marked or followed by a track or trail.
meanings.sent1: The forest was untracked, with no paths to guide us.
meanings.sent2: The hiker ventured into the untracked wilderness.
meanings.sent3: The untracked area seemed like a mystery waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts wandered untracked like a lost traveler.
meanings.sent5: The untracked land stretched out endlessly before us.

meanings.sent1: The untracked data was left unattended for days.
meanings.sent2: The untracked phone calls went unnoticed.
meanings.sent3: The untracked information played hide and seek with the researchers.
meanings.sent4: Her untracked progress in the game surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The untracked footsteps in the snow puzzled the detectives.

meanings.definition: Not kept in check or under control.
meanings.sent1: The untracked behavior of the students disrupted the class.
meanings.sent2: The untracked emotions spilled out uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: His untracked energy was like a wild horse running free.
meanings.sent4: The untracked chaos in the room was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The untracked thoughts in her mind raced in all directions.
